headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  KLEIN, DAVID BERTRAM

snippet: KLEIN--David Bertram. April 20, 1925 - August 18, 2013. Happy Birthday, Dad. We miss you. Lorinda, Warren, Mary Lou. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLEIN--David Bertram. April 20, 1925 - August 18, 2013. Happy Birthday, Dad. We miss you. Lorinda, Warren, Mary Lou. 1/3
